abilities.name: Metal Juncture
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Metal Energy card attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Squared Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
